required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Irbesartan High/Amlodipine FDC and Co-administration of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Crossover, Phase 1 Study to Evaluate Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Irbesartan High/Amlodipine Fixed Dose Combination in Comparison With Co-administration of Mono Compounds in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare pharmacokinetics and safety of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine Fixed Dose Combination and coadministration of mono compounds in healthy adult volunteers

primary_outcome.measure: AUCt of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine
Cmax of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine

secondary_outcome.measure: AUCinf of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine
AUCt/AUCinf of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine
tmax of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine
half-life of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine
CL/F of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine
Vz/F of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine

arm_group.description: participants will receive one tablet of Irbesartan High/Amlodipine FDC in a crossover design

arm_group.arm_group_label: Co-administration of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine
arm_group.description: participants will receive one table each of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine in a crossover design

intervention.description: Co-administration of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine
intervention.arm_group_label: Co-administration of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine

intervention.description: Co-administration of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine
intervention.arm_group_label: Co-administration of Irbesartan High and Amlodipine

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are 19 years or older on screening
- Signed informed consent
- Healthy Volunteer
- Other inclusion applied
Exclusion Criteria:
- Clinically relevant/significant findings as evaluated by the investigator
- Other exclusion applied
